title: The Witch: My Beloved
description: Vincent let his hunger overtake his intuition, and this brought about events that would forever change his destiny.On his way to the New World, with his fledgling Darcy by his side, the ship docked on an island, where the men hunted to quench their thirst. Vincentlet his guard down and pounced on the pretty little female who was out by herself. There were signs he should have paid attention to, but her bloodwas so sweet he couldn't think about nothing.But Vincent didn't know what he has gotten himself into when he drank from the witch.A prologue from the upcoming My Beloved, you're sure to be bitten in and cursed.
author: T.M. Mendes
